definition: to stop/to pull back
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Becoming a winning poker player means knowing when to quit.
sentences.chinese: 成爲撲克中的贏家意味着你知道何時收手。

sentences.english: Place a closed hand over the middle of your abdomen just above your waist.
sentences.chinese: 放置在你的只是你的腰腹部以上中間的收手。

sentences.english: Dong-xu ma persuaded him to quit, but was refused by lee.
sentences.chinese: 馬東旭勸他收手，但遭到李的拒絕。

sentences.english: No sooner did it release its trial balloon on the Luxury Tax, than it met with a public backlash.
sentences.chinese: 課徵奢侈稅才放出風向球，就因民意反彈而收手等等。

sentences.english: A part of him hoped that God would say, “Stop.
sentences.chinese: 其實他心裏一部分是希望上帝會迴應他，“收手吧。”

sentences.english: Say and approve to come back and then quaff in 1 gulp brandy in cup.
sentences.chinese: 說罷，收手回來，便將杯中酒一飲而盡。

definition: to give up
to get away from/to withdraw/to free oneself
to quit while one is ahead (idiom)/to know when to stop
lit. to rein in the horse at the edge of the precipice (idiom)/fig. to act in the nick of time
to concede/to admit defeat
to rest/to take a break
both sides suffer (idiom)/neither side wins
to give up/to abandon (a goal etc)/to let sth go/forget it/let the matter drop
lit. start off leniently (idiom); please do not be too strict with me/Do not judge me too harshly./Look favorably on my humble efforts.
to retreat/to shrink back
to settle/to finish/to conclude/to wind up
if you ride a tiger, it's hard to get off (idiom); fig. impossible to stop halfway
to make a move (in martial arts or figuratively)
to make prompt decisions (idiom)
to fail to achieve something/to be fruitless
to fail/to fall through/to come to nothing
to omit/to neglect
to give up/to admit failure/to drop the matter/to reconcile oneself to loss/to have no more illusions about
